recipesJson.name: dec路a路dent
recipesJson.author: 6retro6
recipesJson.description: Vanilla, chocolate, butterscotch, caramel what more could you ask for...a very decadent ice cream flavour.

reviews.text: Yo, this looks amazing!!!! I have to get FLV Milk Choc. and FW Caramel Candy but i will definitely be mixing this one up. I never picked up the FLV Milk Chocolate so I just added an extra .5% of Glamour Chocolate. That being said this shit is awesome very thick, rich, and smooth but I feel it needs at least 2 weeks to steep. Great recipe and keep it up.
